name: RollHill
description:
Welcome to ROLLHILL!

A physics based racing game where you don't drive a car, nor a bike, but a single wheel! Actually, drive would be an overstatement, because it has no brakes, nor gas, just gravity!

A freeroll down the montain... the ultimate downhill!

Well, okay, we have fitted the wheel with weight distribution module so that you can balance it from afar!

Your key to success is stabilizing the wheel while maintaining a trajectory to stay on track. Sounds easy at first, but takes some time to master!

Now, have you got what it takes to be the ROLLHILL champion?
